text: Richard Riehle (born May 12, 1948) is an American movie, television, voice, and stage actor who is known for his roles in Messengers 2: The Scarecrow, The Man from Earth, Treasure Buddies, Santa Buddies, Office Space, and Chillerama. He also voiced Bumi in the Nickelodeon animated series The Legend of Korra. Riehle was born on May 12, 1948 in Menomonee Falls, WisconsinRichard Riehle Biography (1948â€“) and studied at the University of Notre Dame and at the University of Minnesota. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Wisconsin
title: Richard Riehle
